review: Purchased this on black friday, very disappointed.  Sadly, the google chromecast sucks.  Casts a chrome tab for two seconds.  Casts netflix with poor video quality and no audio for about 2 minutes.  I checked the router compatibility, mine is on the list.  The router is about 6 feet away from the dongle - xbox 360 and apple tv work fine.  Will be returning this on Monday.

review: I just installed the Google Chromecast and it is working great.  I can stream movies and tv programs directly from my Google Nexus 7.  Installation was a breeze and everything went according to the directions.  I can also watch movies that I recorded to my Nexus 7 with no problem.  I am very pleased with this product.
author: Dale J. Martiny

review: The set up was suppose to be fast and easy. Well, suppose to be! It's freaking NOT. After endless attempt that took over 50 minutes it the computer and ipad finally found the chromecast. Praise The Lord!!! If only the configuration was stable, I wouldn't be writing this review, but it lasted exactly two bourse and 37 minutes! The ipad and computer lost the chromecast. Well, I'm on the hunt for this illusive chromecast. This time it took me "only" 42 minutes to reinstall the file that finds this chromecast and to find it. Well, if it only ended there, I wouldn't be here, right? Wrong! The following morning I got lost all connection with the chromecast. Lets roll up our sleeves and hunt this device's signal again. This time it took over an hour, but by noon I already lost all connectivity with the chromecast again.At this point I realized that this technology is a piece of junk and returned it back to the box and shipped it back to Amazon. Maybe it's adolescence issues, maybe it's just not ready for the public yet. Either way, there are better products out there that work much better and are stable. Thanks but no thanks, google.
author: Greer Aviv
